titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of the week of May 12, 2025, through May 16, 2025 as "Veterans Affairs Research Week" to celebrate the research, innovation, and significant contributions of the Department of Veterans Affairs to improving the lives of countless veterans, people in the United States, and individuals around the world.

A resolution expressing support for the designation of the week of May 12, 2025, through May 16, 2025 as "Veterans Affairs Research Week" to celebrate the research, innovation, and significant contributions of the Department of Veterans Affairs to improving the lives of countless veterans, people in the United States, and individuals around the world.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution honors and celebrates the 100-year anniversary of Department of Veterans Affairs research and applauds the researchers and their affiliates. Further, the resolution supports the designation of the week of May 12 through May 16, 2025, as Veterans Affairs Research Week.
